thread.title: BRIEF-Randall & Quilter Says Sale Of Insurance Services Ops

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Randall & Quilter Says Sale Of Insurance Services Ops

organizations.name: brief-randall & quilter says sale of insurance services ops

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Randall & Quilter Investment Holdings Ltd :
* DISPOSAL * ‍ANNOUNCE SALE OF ITS INSURANCE SERVICES AND CAPTIVE MANAGEMENT OPERATIONS TO DAVIES GROUP​
* ‍AGREED VALUATION OF BUSINESSES BEING SOLD IS £20​ * ‍NET CASH CONSIDERATION PAYABLE BY DAVIES, AFTER DEDUCTING NET DEBT APPLICABLE TO BUSINESSES, IS APPROXIMATELY £18.6M​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
